title: 3dAnhist
description: Tool to analyze histogram peaks in a T1-weighted high-res brain image dataset.

dataset.title: Input Dataset
dataset.description: Input dataset, should be T1-weighted high-res brain image (shorts only).

dump_histogram.title: Dump Histogram Flag
dump_histogram.description: Dump histogram data to Anhist.1D and plot to Anhist.ps.

no_scurve.title: No Scurve Flag
no_scurve.description: Do not fit histogram with curves.

winsorize.title: Winsorize
winsorize.description: Apply Winsorizing filter prior to histogram scan. Can specify number of times (e.g., -w7).

top_2peaks.title: Analyze Top 2 Peaks Flag
top_2peaks.description: Analyze top 2 peaks only, for overlap, etc.

label.title: Label
label.description: Use specified label for Anhist.ps plot file instead of the input dataset filename.
